review: Best experience of consulting and he checked completely all pain areas, explained in well experienced way
Doctor was very friendly and explained the issue properly. Took time to explain what to do and how to take care if the injury.

My dad had met the doctor and it was for health problem. Consultation went well. I can definitely recommend the doctor to my family and friends. Doctor spoke well and treated well. Tablets were prescribed by the doctor. MRI scan and ultra sound was done. There was no waiting time in the hospital. He had cancer boils and we taught to check with ortho department. Walking was suggested.

My right ankle had twisted the other day. I was not able to put any weight on it and decided to go to the hospital nearby. Doctor Deepak was very patient and examined my ankle thoroughly. He was very considerate of my pain and didn't want me to take any trouble of walking. He even came downstairs to the X-ray lab to check reports instead of me going to his room upstairs. His prescribed medicines and treatment has worked wonders. I was able to walk the next day itself. Thank you, Doc.
I booked the appointment & the consultation was good the doctor gave **** treatment & required medication , I would like to recommend the doctor to others in future
